[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2774521][img]https://i.imgur.com/uvrVZ20.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6135040][b][Official] VATOP (Value at Time of Post) MyCode for Crypto[/b][/url] - [mention=175033]
Ever wanted to display the price of a coin in your thread? Xerotic added a new widget that allows you to display the value of a currency at the time of posting, compared to the current value. The widget also displays a chart to show the change over time. If you are making an investment thread in the cryptocurrency section, this can certainly come in handy.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6134679][b][Legends] Pi-Hole[/b][/url] - [mention=1339775]
Pi-hole allows you to block ads without needing an adblocker. In this guide, Haseo explains how to get started with the tool and how to get set up. The guide also shows users how to set up OpenVPN for remote access and DNSCrypt.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6135008][b]One hour and 15 minutes to inauguration[/b][/url] - [mention=33574]
Joe Biden took over the office of the President of the United States on January 20, 2021. His inauguration was streamed live on the web. Despite the controversy surrounding vote counting and postal ballots, Trump's term came to an end and Biden was sworn in as president.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6135330][b]Who has the fastest computer on HF - Round 2.[/b][/url] - [mention=2682887]
Some people spend hours picking out their ideal computer parts and then another hour putting them together, all in the spirit of building their dream machine. Do you think you have the best build on the forum? Test your machine and share the results on Mr. Robot's thread. Compare your statistics with others and see who truly has the best machine.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6135496][b]I'm getting married in 3 weeks![/b][/url] - [mention=1610871]
funtela posted about his engagement in the lounge, outlining how he intends to marry his fiancée in just 3 weeks, coinciding with Saint Valentine's Day. He talked about how he fell in love with his childhood friend, forming what many would consider to be a magical match. Congratulations on the engagement!

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6135548][b]My most interesting DoorDash experience yet..[/b][/url] - [mention=3978907]
Not every take-out order goes well. Delivery drivers are humans and they are bound to make mistakes every now and then. KasprDev's driver made a rather odd mistake though. They drove through the neighbours mailbox, causing Kaspr's food to spill everywhere. To give credit to the driver, they offered Kaspr a refund via CashApp.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6134498][b]$100 AUD/$75 USD Easy Money Give Away for L33ts, Ub3rs and Vendors[/b][/url] - [mention=4353379]
Need some extra cash? Check out Euro's giveaway to be in with a chance of winning $75 USD. The contest is only open to upgraded users and lasts for approximately a month.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6130814][b][100k Bytes] Achievers Contest | 3 winners | Happy New Years![/b][/url] - [mention=4227846]
To celebrate a new year, -Scrub’s new group Achievers is doing one of the largest bytes contests that Hack Forums has seen. The first-place winner will receive 50,000 bytes, worth over $150 depending on the current rate. The best part is, members can enter an unlimited number of times.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2774521][img]https://i.imgur.com/IceaZmb.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Pornhub to Support More Cryptocurrencies[/color][/b]
Pornhub has been keen to support cryptocurrencies after Visa and Mastercard blocked the company due to allegations of pornographic material involving minors. In December of 2020, the company added support for multiple coins through the Probiller payment processor. They started out with a generous selection that featured currencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Monero, and Tether. These coins became the default option for people wanting to upgrade. In order to cater to a wider range of customers, the company has expanded to include Ripple, Binance Coin, Dogecoin, and USD Coin. USDC is an alternative to Tether that claims to be the leading stablecoin. At the same time, Pornhub removed Dash and PumaPay. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theblockcrypto.com/linked/91817/pornhub-adds-xrp-bnb-usdc-doge-crypto-payment-options]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Coinbase Plans to Redo Infrastructure[/color][/b]
The popular digital currency exchange Coinbase has pledged to redo its infrastructure. This comes after countless allegations that the company intentionally reduces their platform's usability during rises in the market. Many of the exchange's userbase have reported experiencing issues accessing their portfolio and making trades as Bitcoin and altcoins rise. The cause of the problems is often put down to a significantly larger number of requests during climbs in the market. Users on Reddit disagree with this, stating that they believe Coinbase is purposely preventing customers from making transactions. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.coindesk.com/coinbase-redoing-infrastructure-to-prevent-outages-during-peak-times]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Ethereum Dominates Daily Volume Transacted[/color][/b]
Bitcoin was the first cryptocurrency to exist and, for several years, processed the most transactions. In recent times, Ethereum has changed this. It now handles around 28% more transactions than BTC does when it comes to the daily volume. This can be seen as representing the shift in popularity between the two coins. Ethereum is considered to be superior by many advocates and, due to the coin's smart contract capabilities, it has opened the doors to a wider range of businesses and consumers. [i][size=x-small][url=https://cointelegraph.com/news/flipped-ethereum-now-processes-28-more-transactions-than-bitcoin]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=420][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/gamingnews-redsox.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Hacking allegations rock a $250,000 Warzone tournament[/color][/b]
Amid COVID-19, it should come as no surprise that Call of Duty Warzone has drama within the community and some major drama during a tournament for a quarter of a million dollars. "Last night's Twitch Rivals: Doritos Bowl ft. Call of Duty Warzone finals stream came to an abrupt stop after Canadian competitor Metzy_B was accused of using an aimbot in the series's penultimate game. The moment that raised suspicion was caught on-stream by fellow competitor Thomas "Tommey" Trewren (via Dextero), who dissects the clip to explain how Metzy's aim "locks on" to an opponent right as they enter his line of sight." Activision has been made aware of the rampant cheating that is going on in their game, but they haven't done much on their side to punish the players that are doing it. Over the week, reports on Reddit show users selling mod tools and cheats for Warzone so they can get an unfair advantage over the other participants in the lobby.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/hacking-allegations-rock-a-dollar250000-warzone-tournament-before-descending-into-chaos/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]35 CS:GO players banned for betting on matches[/color][/b]
The Esports Integrity Commission is back at it again with another big takedown. ESIC has formed ago in 2016 and has reported that 70 CS:GO pro players have been banned for life on betting on matches that are taking place. With sports betting taking over online betting, companies need to adapt to the times we live in. This should show you that older games do not discriminate; there will be cheaters and people trying to manipulate the system no matter who backs it. "Over the past few years, ESIC has been investigating instances of betting behavior violations and suspected match manipulation on a global scale," the commission said in the suspension ruling. "While this problem is not unique to ESEA events, the scope of this release will be to explore the result of investigations into such behavior in Australian CS:GO." [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/35-csgo-players-banned-for-betting-on-matches/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cyberpunk 2077's 1.1 patch goes live with fixes and 'stability improvements'[/color][/b]
Cyberpunk 2077's release was one of the most excited for the next-gen consoles and PC's, but sad to say, it did not deliver what it promised us back in November. Reports have come out since stating that CDPR did not consider the last-gen systems out there still very active in the gaming world. The tsunami of backlash would follow for weeks until the studio decided on the refund route. The statement that was put out as if you were not happy with your purchase of how the game runs, with no questions asked, you were entitled to a full refund through whatever provided you purchased Cyberpunk 2077. "In this update, we focused on various stability improvements, which you can find outlined in the patch notes below. We will continue this work in patch 1.2 and other upcoming updates," CD Projekt said in the patch announcement. "At the same time, we will keep fixing the bugs you encounter and listening to your feedback on how to improve the overall game experience." You can see the full patch notes here. Hopefully, the coming updates continue to address the bugs and clunky gameplay at times. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/cyberpunk-2077s-11-patch-goes-live-with-fixes-and-stability-improvements/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3493494][img]https://i.imgur.com/fj0hMCC.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Code Geass: Lelouch of the Re;surrection Anime Film Gets 4D Screenings[/color][/b]
Code Geass: Lelouch of the Re;surrection film was released in Japan in February 2019. The film was released in North America in May 2019. The film's official website announced on December 5th that the film would be getting 4DX and MX4D screenings in 82 theaters in Japan on January 29th. The postcards for the MX4D screenings will feature Lelouch and C.C., while the postcards for the 4DX screenings will feature Lelouch and Suzaku. It is still unknown if these versions will be out for the rest of the world too. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-20/code-geass-lelouch-of-the-re-surrection-anime-film-gets-4d-screenings/.168624]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Sailor Moon Eternal Releases Emotional Trailer & Poster For Part 2![/color][/b]
Sailor Moon Eternal has released a trailer and poster for its upcoming second part! The emotional trailer shows the Sailor Guardians and Tuxedo Mask preparing to square off against Dead Moon. The new movie poster stars Eternal Sailor Moon and all her nine Sailor Guardians allies. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5ff7df12ac7b621cfbe20162/Sailor-Moon-Eternal-Releases-Emotional-Trailer-Poster-For-Part-2!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Crunchyroll Streams Original Digimon Adventure Anime[/color][/b]
Crunchyroll announced on Thursday that it is streaming the original Digimon Adventure anime in Europe, the Middle East, and North Africa. The anime began streaming on Thursday. The first Digimon Adventure television anime series premiered in 1999. Digimon Adventures is an anime about seven kids who come across seven Digivices and are transported to a strange digital world. In this world, they become friends with creatures that call themselves Digimon, and together, they fight to protect that world from various evil forces. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-21/crunchyroll-streams-original-digimon-adventure-anime-in-europe-middle-east-north-africa/.168645]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Distributor Unable to Simulcast Redo of Healer Anime in Germany[/color][/b]
AniMoon Publishing announced on their Facebook account that they were unable to find a simulcast partner for Redo of Healer, the television anime adaptation of Rui Tsukiyo's Kaifuku Jutsushi no Yarinaoshi: Sokushi Mahō to Skill Copy no Chōetsu Heal light novel series, in Germany. They will release the uncensored and uncut version of the anime on DVD and Blue-ray disc in fall 2021. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-21/distributor-unable-to-simulcast-redo-of-healer-anime-in-germany/.168634]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Seven Deadly Sins Anime Gets All-New Original Sequel Film This Summer[/color][/b]
The Seven Deadly Sins franchise is inspiring a new anime film titled The Seven Deadly Sins: Cursed By Light (Nanatsu no Taizai: Hikari ni Norowareshi Mono-tachi) that will open in Japan this summer. This was announced on Wednesday by Kodansha. The film is going to be about an all-new story by the original manga author Nakaba Suzuki and the timeline will be after The Seven Deadly Sins: Dragon's Judgement anime. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-19/seven-deadly-sins-anime-gets-all-new-original-sequel-film-this-summer/.168584]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: RE: Hack Forums News // Edition 489

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium][color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][i]Want to showcase your own Battlestation (Computer Setup)? [url=https://hackforums.net/private.php?action=send&uid=1030620&subject=HFN%20Battlestation&message=Here%20are%20images%20of%20my%20battlestation:%20]Submit yours now![/url][/i][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/vibes-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ccffff]Horoscopes[/color][/b] / [i]Jan 25, 2021 - Jan 31, 2021[/i]

[list]
[*][b][color=#cc3333]Aries ♈[/color][/b]
[i]"On Tuesday, the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in Taurus, creating some tension when it comes to wealth and ownership. You aren’t into “traditional” ways of doing things, but maybe it’s time to use your social connections to find new ways to make money.

On Thursday, you’re feeling lovely and energized when the full moon is in Leo. The moon is in your pleasure zone, making for a very entertaining night! Whether you’re completing a creative project or sealing the deal on a love affair, you’re coming into your power.

Finally, on Saturday, Mercury retrogrades in Aquarius. This retrograde occurs in your friendship sector, creating some major tension in your social group. Watch out! The group chat is about to get heated, especially if politics come up. If you find yourself writing an impulsive text, just delete it instead of sending it. Thank us later."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=1]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff99ff]Taurus ♉[/color][/b]
[i]"We’re fully into Aquarius season, Taurus, and you might feel tempted to go off the beaten path as far as your career is concerned when the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in your sign on Tuesday. Corporate world getting you down? While it’s tempting to go rogue, hold off on making any major life decisions right now.

Stay close to home when the full moon is in Leo on Thursday. The moon is in your domestic zone, bringing gratitude and energy to your home life. This is an excellent day to spend time with your loved ones and express thanks for having them in your life by cooking a meal, watching a movie, or creating something together.

Finally, things go sideways when Mercury retrogrades in Aquarius on Saturday. Mercury reverses in your career sector, creating communication issues at work. Make sure to back up your technology and double-check all e-mails."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=2]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#66cc33]Gemini ♊[/color][/b]
[i]"Take a baby step outside your comfort zone when the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in Taurus on Tuesday. If the winter blues have got you feeling like a hermit, it might be time to go on a little adventure even if you are a bit nervous.

Take a short trip when the full moon is in Leo on Thursday. Whether it’s a day trip or just a drive around the block, getting out of your current environment will help clear your mind and may help you think critically about certain issues that are bothering you.

Get all your traveling done now because you’ll be homebound starting Saturday when Mercury retrogrades in Aquarius. The year’s first retrograde occurs in your philosophy sector, so expect issues and miscommunications with travel, education, and opinions. Cancelled travel plans, troubles at school, and changing your mind are all possibilities for the next couple of weeks."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=3]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3399ff]Cancer ♋[/color][/b]
[i]"Forget social obligations this week, Cancer! As the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in Taurus on Tuesday, you may not feel up to doing things that are “expected” of you. Conserve your energy and do what makes you feel good.

Your self-esteem gets a major boost when the full moon is in generous Leo on Thursday. The moon is in your sector of value, making self-care a must. If you’ve been investing in yourself lately, you’ll start to see it pay off.

On Saturday, Mercury retrogrades in Aquarius (groan). This retrograde occurs in your sector of intimacy, creating some communication issues when talking about personal matters and taboos. This could lead to problems creating and maintaining bonds with others, being able to let go of the past, and stunting your attitude about growth. Don’t be afraid to let go and let grow."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=4]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff9933]Leo ♌[/color][/b]
[i]"The week starts with some vulnerability as the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in Taurus on Tuesday. If you’re struggling, don’t put on a brave face. That will only make it worse. Instead, put your pride aside and let people help you.

Fortunately, you’ll get the opportunity to strut your stuff when the full moon is in your sign on Thursday, giving you its manifesting energy. All the goals you’ve been working toward since August are finally coming to fruition. Take action and bask in the spotlight, Leo. It was made for you.

However, the week ends on a sour note as Mercury retrogrades in Aquarius on Saturday. This retrograde occurs in your house of partnerships, making your relationships tense for the next couple of weeks. Petty squabbles and misunderstandings could damage your interactions if you aren’t careful. Try not to let your competitive nature burn any important bridges."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=5]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#339933]Virgo ♍[/color][/b]
[i]"As the helper of the zodiac, you’re always willing to go the extra mile for others. However, when the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in Taurus on Tuesday, use that helpful nature to take care of yourself. What can you do to make your life easier?

Hidden talents could come to the fore when the full moon is in Leo on Thursday. The moon is in your sector of privacy, revealing things from your inner depths, including things you weren’t aware of before now.

Then it’s the dreaded retrograde of Mercury on Saturday. Mercury’s retrograde affects you more than others because it’s your ruling planet, so expect to feel a little more anxious than normal. Mercury reverses in Aquarius and your sector of routine, so you might see some delays in your work and productivity as your schedule gets messed up. Don’t forget to save all your work!"[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=6]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3366ff]Libra ♎[/color][/b]
[i]"This week could be a little overwhelming, Libra. Your desire for pleasure and fear of taboo could lead to an emotional conflict as the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in Taurus on Tuesday. It’s okay to take a walk on the wild side of life, but don’t lose your head.

Get active when the full moon is in Leo and your sector of friendship on Thursday. This is an excellent opportunity to spend time with friends and reconnect. If you’ve been dreaming of something, that dream could become reality.

Mercury goes into retrograde in Aquarius on Saturday, messing up both your weekend and the next few weeks. Mercury reverses in your pleasure sector, creating issues in how you express yourself creatively and how you experience pleasure. This is a good time to change your video-streaming password, and don’t send any compromising photos."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=7]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#8B0000]Scorpio ♏[/color][/b]
[i]"Your solid foundation could face a few shake-ups this week when the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in Taurus on Tuesday. You might feel the need to resist tradition and forge your own path. However, don’t neglect your established partnerships as you go your own way.

You’ll get a boost in your reputation when the full moon is in Leo on Thursday. The moon is in your career sector, which could mean you receive recognition for your achievements. You’re famous for playing the long game, Scorpio, and you could finally see the fruits of your labors.

However, domestic drama could put a damper on your weekend when Mercury retrogrades in Aquarius on Saturday. This retrograde occurs in your family sector and could create some serious communication issues at home. Whether you get into a heated discussion about politics or bicker about what streaming service to use, expect your home life to be a little tense."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#FFFF00]Sagittarius ♐[/color][/b]
[i]"Communication is very important this week, Sagittarius. If you’re struggling with an issue, speak up when the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in Taurus on Tuesday. If something isn’t working, try thinking about a new way to do it. It might be frustrating to try to convince others to see things your way, but it will be worth it.

Adventure awaits you when the full moon is in Leo and your sector of philosophy on Thursday. This is a good time to expand your ideas and beliefs through travel or education. Seek out new experiences!

Finally, Mercury goes retrograde in Aquarius and your sector of communication on Saturday, giving you a double whammy of communication issues. For the next couple of weeks it will be very important to watch what you say and how you say it. If you don’t have anything nice to say, zip it!"[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=9]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#663333]Capricorn ♑[/color][/b]
[i]"You start the week with the sun in Aquarius squaring Uranus in Taurus on Tuesday, creating some creative blockage. Just because you’re not making money off your pet passion, it doesn’t mean it has no value. If you enjoy it, Capricorn, it’s valuable.

On Thursday, the full moon is in Leo and your intimacy sector, making it a great day for personal transformation. If you’ve been working on your personal growth, you could finally see it pay off in your intimate relationship. However, don’t fall back into old grudges. Be like Elsa and let it go.

Change your passwords when Mercury goes into retrograde in Aquarius on Saturday. This retrograde occurs in your sector of value, which could manifest itself as problems with electronics. It could also lead to some self-worth issues. Speak to yourself with kindness for the next couple of weeks."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=10]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#9966ff]Aquarius ♒[/color][/b]
[i]"Emotions could run high when the sun in your sign squares Mars and Taurus on Tuesday and creates tension at home. While it might be tempting to block out different emotions and go into robot mode, it wouldn’t be helpful. Instead, use your brilliant mind to come up with a unique approach to make everyone happy.

Love comes into full bloom when the full moon is in vibrant Leo on Thursday. The moon is in your partnership zone, meaning any relationships and attractions you’ve been working toward can finally manifest. Enjoy!

However, Mercury goes into retrograde on Saturday. Mercury is reversing in your sign, making the next few weeks extra tricky because you could have difficulty starting new projects and lack self-awareness. The best way to handle this is to stay off social media and keep a low profile as you try to make the best of things."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=11]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#cccc66]Pisces ♓[/color][/b]
[i]"Say how you feel when the sun in Aquarius squares Uranus in Taurus on Tuesday. It might seem romantic and mysterious when you retreat into your inner world, but people could be concerned about your odd behavior. Don’t be passive-aggressive and make them guess how you feel—just say it!

Fortunately, you’ll feel very vital and productive when the full moon is in vibrant Leo on Thursday. Whatever routine you’ve cultivated, it’s really paying off at work because you feel brighter, more energetic, and ready to reach your goals. Enjoy these good vibes.

On Saturday, Mercury goes into retrograde in Aquarius, giving you all the feels. Mercury reverses in your sector of privacy, bringing all your hidden emotions to the surface. Be careful because your private life may become public. Focus on inner healing, and don’t post anything personal on social media. And please, don’t text your exes!"[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=12]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/list]
